name: RIYADZ NUZ
bio: Chef Gordon Ramsay: A renowned British chef and television personality, Gordon Ramsay has made a name for himself in the culinary world with his fiery personality and exceptional cooking skills. He has opened several successful restaurants across the globe and has received numerous accolades for his contributions to the industry.

name: OLIVIA IANZ
bio: Chef Julia Child: Widely regarded as one of the most influential chefs of the 20th century, Julia Child was an American chef and television personality who introduced French cuisine to the American public through her popular TV show, The French Chef. She authored several cookbooks and received numerous awards for her contributions to the culinary world.

recipes.cooking_method:

keep it for roasting on an open flame. You can also grill the baingan or roast in the oven. But then you won't get
the smoky flavor of the baingan. Keep the eggplant turning after a 2 to 3 minutes on the flame, so that its evenly
cooked. You .

name: JERMY ITE
bio: Chef Massimo Bottura: An Italian chef and restaurateur, Massimo Bottura is the owner and head chef of Osteria Francescana, a three-Michelin-starred restaurant in Modena, Italy. He is known for his innovative approach to traditional Italian cuisine and has received numerous awards for his contributions to the industry.

name: HANRY MES
bio: Chef Dominique Crenn: A French chef based in the United States, Dominique Crenn is the first female chef in the US to receive three Michelin stars. She is the owner and head chef of Atelier Crenn, a restaurant in San Francisco that offers a unique and creative approach to fine dining.

name: ICHARD AUZ
bio: Chef Marcus Samuelsson: A Swedish-Ethiopian chef and restaurateur, Marcus Samuelsson is the owner and head chef of several successful restaurants, including Red Rooster in Harlem and Marcus B&P in Newark. He is known for his fusion of traditional African, European, and American cuisine and has received numerous awards for his contributions to the industry.

name: RINAUZ JUN
bio: Chef José Andrés: A Spanish-American chef and humanitarian, José Andrés is the owner and head chef of several successful restaurants, including Jaleo and minibar by José Andrés. He is also the founder of World Central Kitchen, a non-profit organization that provides food relief to disaster-stricken areas around the world. Andrés has received numerous awards for his contributions to the culinary industry and his philanthropic work.
